definition: prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
plural marker for pronouns, and nouns referring to individuals

sentences.english: A is for Amen, anointing we agree.
sentences.chinese: 是阿们，我们一致的恩膏涂抹。

sentences.english: The "Amen" comes first because some hallelujahs have been spoken already.
sentences.chinese: 因为阿利路亚已被说过几次了，所以他们先说阿们。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
Abba (Aramaic word father)/by ext. God the Father in Christian gospel
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
memorial tablet in a temple commemorating a deceased father
to pray on behalf of sb
